sentence.Network_en: He has a six-pack stomach and is extremely well-proportioned.
The flat has high ceilings and well-proportioned rooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 这套公寓天花板很高，各房间比例均衡。
客厅的比例合理，尽显大气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语书面表达丛书（人物篇） ... 6. abstraction: 抽象派 7. proportioned: 匀称的，成比例的 8. marsh: 沼泽，湿地.
the head is large and proportioned .头部大而比例匀称。
the net effect is that you wind up with a much better proportioned working space .总的效果是你折腾出一个更符合比例的工作空间。
proportionate 比例抽样, proportioned 配合得的, proportionate 相当的

list.abs: 比例代表制(proportional representation): 基于各政党得选票数目而确定议会代表比例构成的政体。共和制(republic): 由民选代表负责.
中日会计用语 ... 所得税 incom tax 比例税 proportional tax 税前扣除 pre-tax deduction.
...外力作用，当应力不超过某一极限时，应力与应变成正比例关系，即遵从虎克定律，符合虎克定律的应力极限值，称为比例极限（proportional limit）。它是材料不偏离正比例应力-应变关系所能承受的最大应力。
PERCENTILE函数 - Sean的日志 - 网易博客 ... Infinite decimal 无穷小数 Inverse proportion 反比 Irrational number 无理数.

entry.tran: （和副词一起构成形容词）表示“成比例的”，“协调的”，“均衡的”
entry.def: -proportioned is added to adverbs to form adjectives that indicate that the size and shape of the different parts of something or someone are pleasing or useful.

example.ex: The flat has high ceilings and well-proportioned rooms.
example.tran: 这套公寓天花板很高，各房间比例均衡。
身材非常匀称的年轻女子

auth_sentence.content: They're not very tall, but they're well proportioned.
